content: उपनिधिः {@--1@} A deposit, pledge, property entrusted to another. {@--2@} (In law) A sealed deposit; <ls>Y. 2. 25</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 145</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 8.">149</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Medhātithi</ls>: --यदप्रदर्शितरूपं सचिह्रवस्त्रादिना पिहितं निक्षिप्यते; also <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Y. 2. 65</ls> and Nārada quoted in <ls>Mit.</ls>
